description.en: A foundational sequence designed to build basic strength and stability for beginners. This practice focuses on core engagement and proper alignment to develop a strong foundation for your yoga practice.
description.zh: 为初学者设计的基础序列，旨在建立基本力量和稳定性。这个练习专注于核心参与和正确对齐，为你的瑜伽练习发展坚实基础。

instructions.en: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart, engage your core and lengthen your spine.
instructions.zh: 双脚与髋同宽站立，收紧核心，延长脊柱。

transitionHint.en: Begin in a centered standing position, finding your foundation and awakening your strength.
transitionHint.zh: 从中心站姿开始，找到你的基础并唤醒你的力量。

instructions.en: Bend your knees as if sitting in a chair, reach arms up, keep weight in heels.
instructions.zh: 弯曲膝盖仿佛坐在椅子上，手臂上举，重心保持在脚跟。

transitionHint.en: From Mountain Pose, bend your knees and sit back as you reach your arms overhead.
transitionHint.zh: 从山式，弯曲膝盖并向后坐，同时将手臂上举。

instructions.en: Step one foot back, bend front knee, lift arms overhead, face forward.
instructions.zh: 一只脚向后迈，弯曲前腿膝盖，手臂上举，面朝前方。

transitionHint.en: From Chair Pose, step one foot back into a lunge, keeping your front knee bent and torso facing forward.
transitionHint.zh: 从椅式，一只脚向后迈成弓步，保持前腿膝盖弯曲，上身面向前方。

instructions.en: Widen stance, turn back foot parallel to back edge of mat, extend arms to sides.
instructions.zh: 加宽站姿，后脚与垫子后缘平行，手臂向两侧伸展。

transitionHint.en: From Warrior I, open your hips to the side and extend your arms parallel to the floor.
transitionHint.zh: 从战士一式，打开髋部向侧面，手臂平行于地面伸展。

instructions.en: Create a straight line from head to heels, engage core, keep shoulders over wrists.
instructions.zh: 从头到脚跟形成一条直线，收紧核心，肩膀保持在手腕上方。

transitionHint.en: Step back to the front of your mat, then lower into a plank position, keeping your body in one straight line.
transitionHint.zh: 步回到垫子前方，然后下降到平板支撑位置，保持身体成一条直线。

instructions.en: Balance on sitting bones, lift legs and upper body to form a V-shape.
instructions.zh: 在坐骨上平衡，抬起腿部和上身形成V形。

transitionHint.en: Come to a seated position, lean back slightly and lift your legs to create a V-shape with your body.
transitionHint.zh: 来到坐姿，轻微向后倾斜并抬起双腿，与身体形成V形。

instructions.en: Lie on back, feet flat, knees bent, lift hips, roll shoulders under.
instructions.zh: 仰卧，脚掌平放，膝盖弯曲，抬起髋部，肩膀下卷。

transitionHint.en: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor, then press into your feet to lift your hips.
transitionHint.zh: 仰卧，膝盖弯曲，脚掌平放在地面上，然后通过脚部用力抬起髋部。

instructions.en: Lie flat on your back, arms at sides, palms up, and completely relax.
instructions.zh: 平躺，手臂放在身体两侧，掌心向上，完全放松。

transitionHint.en: Gently lower your back to the floor, extend your legs and arms, and allow your body to fully relax.
transitionHint.zh: 轻轻将背部放回地面，伸展双腿和手臂，让身体完全放松。

benefits.en: Builds core and overall body strength
benefits.zh: 增强核心和整体身体力量
提高稳定性和平衡能力

benefits.en: Develops proper alignment and body mechanics
benefits.zh: 发展正确的身体对齐和机械原理
